sentence.Network_en: Lemon and lime juice were both temporarily out of stock.
sentence.Network_cn: 柠檬汁和酸橙汁暂时都缺货。

sentence.Network_en: The human population swelled, at least temporarily, as migrants moved south.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着移居者南移，人口出现膨胀，至少是暂时性膨胀。

sentence.Network_en: The stress of war temporarily unhinged him.
sentence.Network_cn: 战争的压力让他一时丧失了神志。

entry.def: Something that is temporary lasts for only a limited time.

example.ex: His job here is only temporary...
example.tran: 他在这儿的工作只是临时的。
多数青少年问题是暂时性的。

means.word_mean: 1. for a limited time only; not permanently;

sentences.sentence: "he was brought out of retirement temporarily"
"a power failure temporarily darkened the town"

auth_sentence.content: The deprivations waged by the plauge were temporarily forgotten.
auth_sentence.res_content: The deprivations waged by the plauge were temporarily forgotten.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The deprivations waged by the plauge were temporarily forgotten.

auth_sentence.content: Hydrogen injection into the reactors was also temporarily suspended.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hydrogen injection into the reactors was also temporarily suspended.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hydrogen injection into the reactors was also temporarily suspended.

auth_sentence.content: Businesses around the globe temporarily abandoned their infected computers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Businesses around the globe temporarily abandoned their infected computers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Businesses around the globe temporarily abandoned their infected computers.

Sentence.sentence: However, soon after these fierce outbreaks, the virus died out, at least temporarily.

sentences.en: The stranger’s question surprised me so that I temporarily lost my tongue.
sentences.cn: 那陌生人的询问使我大吃一惊,一时之间连话都说不出来了。

sentences.en: When things get a bit too much,she simply tunes out temporarily.
sentences.cn: 碰到事情太棘手时,她干脆暂时撒手不管。

sentences.en: Both sides in the conflict have agreed temporarily to suspend hostilities.
sentences.cn: 冲突双方同意暂时停火。

sentences.en: The thundershower had temporarily scattered the swimmers.
sentences.cn: 雷阵雨暂时驱散了游泳的人。
